title: Auto Expo 2023: Suzuki Corp announces global unveil of first EV as eVX - ETAuto
summary: Maruti Suzuki showcases the Concept Electric SUV eVX at the Auto Expo 2023, featuring a mid-size electric SUV powered by a 60 kWh battery pack with a 550 km driving range. The company emphasizes sustainable powertrain systems and commitment to environmental friendliness and sustainability.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article discusses Maruti Suzuki's focus on sustainable motoring and long-term commitment to reducing greenhouse gas emissions, promoting a range of global measures to address global warming, including investing in BEVs and their batteries.
business_innovation: TRUE. Maruti Suzuki showcasing the Concept Electric SUV eVX at the Auto Expo 2023 represents a new product introduction that differs significantly from their previous products, emphasizing technological development and innovation in sustainable powertrain systems.
green_product: TRUE. The Concept Electric SUV eVX showcased by Maruti Suzuki qualifies as a green product due to its electric powertrain, sustainable design elements, and focus on reducing environmental impact throughout its life cycle.
green_process: FALSE. The article does not explicitly describe a manufacturing or operational process that minimizes environmental impacts or promotes sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 336111 - Automobile Manufacturing, 336390 - Other Motor Vehicle Parts Manufacturing, 336390 - Motor Vehicle Electrical and Electronic Equipment Manufacturing, 336112 - Light Truck and Utility Vehicle Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not exhibit characteristics of greenwashing as it focuses on the genuine efforts of Maruti Suzuki in developing sustainable powertrain systems and promoting environmental friendliness.
